thread.title: Indiana firm buys Westminster DoubleTree hotel
thread.title_full: Indiana firm buys Westminster DoubleTree hotel

author: Ed Sealover
title: Indiana firm buys Westminster DoubleTree hotel
text: Indiana firm buys Westminster DoubleTree hotel Jul 2, 2015, 1:42pm MDT Courtesy of The Plasencia Group The DoubleTree by Hilton Denver-Westminster is under new ownership. An Indiana real estate investment firm has purchased the DoubleTree by Hilton Denver-Westminster hotel. Hotel Capital LLC bought the 180-room hotel located just off of U.S. 36 from Burrus Investment Group Inc. of Metarie, Louisiana. Terms of the deal, including sale price, were not disclosed. With the hotel being located between Denver and Boulder and near a number of large companiesâ€™ regional offices, the owners view the DoubleTree as a profitable venture, said Joe Corcoran , vice president of The Plasencia Group, a Florida-based hotel investment and consulting firm that advised Burrus on the sale of the property. Business Pulse
